programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E13, Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E15, Police solve a murder when divers find a skeleton in a car at the bottom of a river, and a dead dog's DNA helps crack open a 6-year-old case.

programme.title: She Never Came Home
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E03, The case of a gruesome stabbing death of a bullied teenager remains unsolved for 27 years.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (#1)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E01, Looks at how law enforcers stick with cases for many years, using fresh evidence to win convictions or to free prisoners who were wrongfully jailed. We examine the unsolved murder of Hogan's Heroes star Bob Crane.

programme.title: Missing and Murdered
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E26, In Cree culture, a promise is sacred. When Cree woman Shirley Soosay goes missing in 1980, her niece Violet promises her grandmother that she will bring Shirley home.

programme.title: Murder In the Midwest
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E03, The body of Lori Nesson is found in a ditch in 1974, yet her death is not ruled a homicide. After four decades, the cause of death is changed to homicide, and the search begins for a killer.

programme.title: Danny Bible/License To Kill
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E21, A Texas woman's murder is finally solved when the killer's plan to kill a second woman and stuff her into a duffel bag goes awry.

programme.title: Ice Cold in Denver
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E08, On a bitter morning in 1980, radio intern Helene Pruszynski is found brutalized in a snowy field. After 37 years of fruitless leads, investigators tap into a genealogy website that gives them a lead.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E24, A mother is suspected in the murders of two of her daughters when her third daughter finally convinces police to reopen two cold cases.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E21, A North Carolina man looking to clear his conscience gives police the information they need to solve a murder. And Indiana police are baffled by the murder of an 86-year-old woman, found dead in her bedroom.

programme.title: Gone in a New York Minute
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E02, In a city of eight million, landlord Bruce Blackwood disappears without a trace in March 2006. Though there is no body, the NYPD is sure this is a homicide and they spend the next nine years searching for answers.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E25, A murderer's saliva, found on envelopes, helps seal his doom 37 years after his first killing. And Colorado police crack a cold case 24 years later when they take a DNA sample from the victim's son that proves that his father murdered his mother.

programme.title: Texas Drifter/Fingerprints/Rose Among Thorns
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E03, From England to Texas to Georgia, I.R. will go inside cold case units and watch as police use ballistics testing, old fashioned fingerprints and a new DNA data bank for criminals, to crack open the mysteries of unsolved crimes.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E16, A police investigator discovers a letter written 16 years earlier that provides clues to a woman's murder. And a firearms expert supplies the evidence that South Carolina authorities need to put a man on trial in 2002 for a murder committed in 1961.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E24, A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E15, Fire investigator Jack Malooly helps crack the case of an arsonist and killer who set fires to collect insurance money, and a prison inmate tells a detective that he can't help him with his current investigation, but knows about a 15-year-old murder.

programme.title: The Original Nightstalker
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E05, In the 1980s, a serial killer prowled the posh streets of Orange County. Police were unaware of the serial attacks until 1996, when DNA revealed the killer's secret and they linked four murders to a single DNA profile.

As Eegah’s fondness for her grows, Can Dr. Miller and Roxy’s boyfriend Tom save her from the clutches of the prehistoric caveman?

programme.title: Air (Part 3)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E03, With the air supply failing on the Destiny, a team disembarks to a desert-like planet in search of a mineral needed to scrub the ship's air of carbon dioxide. While one team presses on to find the vital mineral, the other has another goal in mind.

programme.title: The Curse
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E13, When Daniel Jackson returns to Chicago to attend the funeral of his mentor, a celebrated archaeologist, he soon realizes that the death is mysteriously connected to the recent discovery of a 10,000-year-old Egyptian artifact that might be cursed.

programme.title: The Serpent's Venom
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E14, SG-1 travels to a remote interplanetary minefield to sabotage a hazardous alliance between two powerful Goa'uld System Lords. But their mission becomes far more dangerous when they realize Teal'c has been captured by one of the Lords.

programme.title: Chain Reaction
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E15, When SGC commander Gen. Hammond steps down saying he's too old for the job, SG-1 suspects foul play. When a hard-nosed new general steps in to replace him and splits up SG-1, they vow to solve the mystery and get their beloved General back.

Stargate SG-1, S04E16, A decade in the future, Earth's alliance with a highly intelligent race of aliens has rendered SGC obsolete. But when Carter, now married to an ambassador, uncovers a terrifying secret, she must reassemble SG-1 to send an urgent message to the past.

programme.title: Absolute Power
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E17, When a chosen boy is brought to SGC, he sends a telepathic message, causing Daniel's personality to undergo disturbing changes. Will the rest of SG-1 be able to solve the mystery of the boy's origin before he becomes a power-hungry warmonger?

programme.title: The Light
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E18, SG-1 travels to a planet to investigate a machine that induces narcotic pleasure. But when they try to leave the planet, they are overcome with debilitating withdrawal symptoms, forcing them to stay. Can they free themselves from this addiction?

programme.title: Prodigy
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E19, Carter takes a young cadet under her wing on a mission to a remote planet inhabited by unique electronic beings. But when the creatures suddenly turn aggressive, SG-1 will need the cadet's brainpower to help them escape with their lives!

programme.title: Entity
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E20, When SG-1 sends a probe through the Stargate, a powerful electronic impulse comes back through and hides inside SGC's computer. But when the entity suddenly jumps inside Carter's mind, SG-1 must choose between saving SGC and saving Carter's life!

programme.title: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E21, SG-1 encounters a tricky situation when they join forces with androids designed to look like them in a battle against an evil Goa'uld System Lord. Can they fight alongside robotic doppelgangers, or will confusion and contradiction blur the line?

programme.title: Exodus
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E22, SG-1 joins forces with the Tok'ra in a final attempt to rid the universe of their mutual Goa'uld nemesis, Apophis. But their plan goes awry when a member of the team is captured and they find themselves at the mercy of their most feared enemy!

programme.title: Enemies
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E01, Presumed dead, Teal'c (Christopher Judge) is discovered very much alive…but still under the control of the evil Apophis (Peter Williams). Will the SG-1 team be able to rescue their friend from the clutches of Apophis or will they die trying?

programme.title: Threshold
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E02, While Teal’c’s body has been saved from death on Apophis’ ship, his mind is still loyal to his Goa’uld lord. Jaffa Master Bra’tac suggests an ancient ritual to restore Teal'c's mind...a ritual fraught with danger and one which no one has survived.

programme.title: The Game
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E15, Lorne discovers a planet with dozens of satellites in orbit. However, inhabitants on this planet are no further advanced than the renaissance and have a flag with McKay's face. The team realize a game they had found earlier might be more than a game.

programme.title: The Ark
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E16, Investigating an abandoned space station, McKay mistakenly brings one of its scientists out of stasis. The scientist explains to the team that the base was the last effort by his people to avoid the repeated culling they've endured by the Wraith.

programme.title: Sunday
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E17, With the entire city ordered to take a personal day the team does their best to unwind and enjoy their leisure time. Without warning a mysterious explosion rips through the city killing and injuring unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Submersion
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E18, The team searches the ocean for a mobile geothermal drilling station the ancients left dormant. Cautiously exploring the station, Teyla thinks she senses the presence of a Wraith. Weir, believing it's pressure affecting Teyla, has the team press on.

programme.title: Housewarming
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E06, David and Mark throw a big party at their house. Clare catches Steve kissing another girl. Valerie comes clean with Brandon about her affair with Kenny.

programme.title: Fearless
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E07, Kenny orders Valerie to terminate her pregnancy. Steve is miffed when Clare chooses to go to the Halloween concert with egotistical Dick Harrison. Brandon and Tracy spend time together at the club.

programme.title: The Things We Do For Love
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E08, Steve overhears Val discussing her pregnancy on the phone. David's grandfather leaves him $250,000 and a 1961 Thunderbird. An uncomfortable Tracy decides to quit her TV job after Brandon nixes a relationship.

programme.title: Loser Take All
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E09, Brandon goes to see Kenny, who portrays himself as an innocent victim caught on the web of an evil vixen. Mel, worried by David's newfound wealth, asks Donna to keep an eye on him. Steve impresses Clare with his dedication as he trains for the crew race.

programme.title: If I Had A Hammer
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E11, During must see a psychiatrist after displaying hostile behavior. Mel agrees with the doctor's recommendation that David be held 72 hours for observation. Steve faces plagiarism charges. The gang helps Willie build a house.

programme.title: Judgment Day
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E12, Steve elects to plead guilty, leaving his punishment to the lenient Chancellor Arnold. Brandon refuses to plead guilty to a crime he did not commit, and faces a hearing and possible expulsion. Felice objects to Donna's renewed relationship with David.

programme.title: Unnecessary Roughness
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E15, Donna believes she has solved the mystery of her stalker's identity when she sees Garrett Slan, the man who tried to rape her, at the university.

programme.title: Face-Off
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E16, Donna's request for a permanent restraining order against Slan is denied. Tracy accidentally tells Brandon that she loves him. Steve and Clare consider living together as they spend a weekend house sitting. David takes an interest in a young singer.

programme.title: We Interrupt This Program
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E17, Donna's stalker confesses and holds the entire staff of the TV station hostage.

programme.title: With This Ring
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E19, Brandon and Kelly each confess their feelings to friends, but expect the other person to make a move. Donna tries to reconcile with David. Steve and Clare double date with Ryan and his girlfriend.

programme.title: A Ripe Young Age
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E20, Donna and David visit her grandmother in San Luis Obispo. Noting a striking resemblance between David and her late husband, Mrs. Martin tells the couple about her romance with Donna's grandfather.

programme.title: Storm Warnings
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E21, Joey returns to the beach apartment. Rob irritates his manager by seeking Val's advice about whether to sign on for a new movie. Jim and Cindy invite Brandon to spend spring vacation in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Spring Breakdown
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E22, Brandon and Tracy visit Jim in Hong Kong; Cindy is in London helping Brenda cope with mononucleosis. Clare and Steve encourage Kelly to go out instead of moping around the apartment.

programme.title: Heaven Sent
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E23, Mariah comes to town to give a lecture at the university's new age festival. She develops an instant connection with Kelly, prompting Tracy to bristle. David tries to plan a special evening for Donna.

programme.title: All That Jazz
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E26, Brandon has to take care of Kelly and Valerie, who are both laid up with the flu. The girls discuss the reasons for their feud.

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E27, Kelly learns that she is pregnant. Val makes a pass at David, prompting Donna to order him to end their working relationship. Clare is saddened by Mother's Day, so Steve tries to take her mind off things by going for a drive.

programme.title: The Way We Weren't
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E04, Brandon is heartbroken when Kelly is unable to remember their relationship. Valerie helps organize Donna when she has trouble keeping track of her clients. Donna decides to make Val her business partner.
